author: Special Correspondent
text:
Breaking her silence, the Chief Minister threatened the opposition with a similar expose

Breaking her silence on the Narada News sting operation where several leaders of the ruling Trinamool Congress ( TMC) were seen allegedly accepting wads of cash on camera, West Bengal Chief Minister and TMC chairperson Mamata Banerjee on Tuesday described it as “political vendetta” and done with a political purpose.

In an interview to a local television channel ETV Bangla, Ms. Banerjee said such “fake CDs” will have no bearing on the outcome of the polls. “If the videos are really authentic, then why is the media running a disclaimer about not having verified its authenticity,” she asked the interviewer.
title: Mamata terms Narada sting political vendetta
